BR_text.BRsummary: Compressed replays sometimes cannot be read correctly
BR_text.BRdescription:
This doesn't happen very often, but sometimes I cannot read a compressed replay when I can read the uncompressed version. An example can be downloaded here: ﻿<denchmark-link:https://www.dropbox.com/s/1bkntbkpm1zolnf/bwrep_7p5q6.rep?dl=0>https://www.dropbox.com/s/1bkntbkpm1zolnf/bwrep_7p5q6.rep?dl=0</denchmark-link>
 
 Simply compress it with zstd zstd -e5 bwrep_7p5q6.rep -o bwrep_7p5q6.tcr
 In Python, I can do:
 <denchmark-code>from torchcraft import replayer
 rep = replayer.load("bwrep_7p5q6.rep")
 bad = replayer.load("bwrep_7p5q6.tcr")
 </denchmark-code>
 
 Same thing happens in lua. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jgehring>@jgehring</denchmark-link>
  if you have any idea why this happens let me know.
